description: Provide LLMs with the current date and time context based on the server's system clock. Enable your agents to access accurate and up-to-date temporal information seamlessly. Simplify time-related queries and operations within your LLM workflows.

tools.name: get_current_datetime
tools.description: Get the current server date and time. Optionally specify a timezone (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London', 'Asia/Tokyo'). Defaults to server's configured timezone or UTC.

timezone.description: Optional timezone identifier (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London', 'Asia/Tokyo'). If not provided, uses the server's default timezone or UTC.
